mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = 2*a[n-1] - NextPrime[ a[n-1], -1]; a[0] = 3; Table[ a[n], {n, 0, 50}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Sep 24 2012 *)NestList[2#-NextPrime[#,-1]&,3,50] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 19 2014 *)
